resources.string: "Costumer satisfaction is vital in our service delivery.\nWe ask you to take a few minutes to rate us on the aspects of our service si that we can serve you better.\nWe value your opinion."
Please rate the below characteristics between 1 and 10 (1 being poor and 10 being excellent)
Thank you for taking the time to complete this survey
Would you recommend our service to you friends and colleagues?
Cleanliness and comfort of waiting area (if applicable)
Cleanliness of the examination treatment room
Explanation on tests, procedures and treatment by medical personal
Explanation on after care and the end of the visit by medical personal
Proessionalism of the medical personal (neal in appearance, clean uniform, friendly and respectful)
Please name employee(s) who has/have exceed your service expectations (if applicable)
Describe areas where we can do better (if applicable)
